title: Free speech
text: The game is good but ever since they added the chat update where you can‚Äôt speak freely and can only speak a certain amount of words that are given to you it‚Äôs less fun. It makes it more difficult to speak especially when the meetings are sometimes very short. This update makes the games much shorter and we aren‚Äôt able to speak freely to each other. I know this is for the safety of children but the parents are irresponsible to let their kids come play with strangers they should‚Äôve known that and that their child is playing with strangers. The game was fun but this new update has made it not that enjoyable since we can‚Äôt interact with New people and fun with talking to them. This also stops people from making friends. It‚Äôs all like we are people under a tyrant ruling we can say things that they want to say this update is terrible and it‚Äôs all because of irresponsible parents letting their child into a game with complete strangers and not telling what to do when some random person is asking them serious questions. This update is terrible and I don‚Äôt like it at all please change it I wanna play a good freedom of speech version of among us.

title: Great but...
text:
Overall this is a pretty great game. However there are some recent issues that have come to light. For one being that I‚Äôm assuming that since your game has become very popular recently so the game can‚Äôt handle the amount of people on it. So you can never really get a game in. Another thing is that I find the roles of crew mate and imposter at times somewhat monotonous and boring. Especially if you‚Äôre a crewmate. I feel that there could be a lot more things that an imposter and crewmate could do to make it more fun and interactive. For example, maybe players can playfully brawl in the lobby. Or crewmates can use their pets as scouts to look elsewhere. But only at the risk of making themselves vulnerable. Etc. Yet I think this is a really fun game that has a lot of potential.

‚Äî‚Äî Revisit

I think it‚Äôd be great if ghosts can play tag while they‚Äôre dead. Cause it can get pretty annoying/boring. Like they would have to complete all of their tasks in order to play to give incentive to complete their tasks for the living crewmates to win. And when all of the current ghosts have finished, the game tag commences. And any new ghosts will have to complete their tasks to join in.

title: Great Game! One small recent glitch though.
text:
Love the game, everything about it is amazing! I‚Äôve been experiencing a glitch lately though that I thought I should tell you about. I‚Äôve only experienced it on the Polus map, though it could be on the others: when I went to do the temperature task by the lava pit in Polus, I clicked the ‚Äúuse‚Äù triangle but the task didn‚Äôt open. This also happened in the Laboratory. The only way that the crew mates were able to win was to vote out the imposter. The glitch happened on all the rounds I played in Polus, but it hadn‚Äôt happened before. I just thought to let you know about this, because it causes a big problems for the players. The game is absolutely phenomenal outside the glitch üòä keep up the great work!

Edit: I played on each of the maps, and found that the glitch is only happening on the temperature tasks in the map Polus. Just wanted to let you know üòä

Edit 2: I would like to say thanks for having an update that fixed the tasks! The game is a 10 out of 5 stars and I recommend it to everyone! Recently my mom got the game and she loves it to! Great work innersloth!

title: Tips
text: I think at least a few player that have been playing the game for a few years can agree that they like the old textures/looks. Something I suggest is making a way in which people can activate old textures for their view only. Also, add a way to see if your friends are playing the game or not. Me and my friends love to play this game together, but we can‚Äôt normally get together because I have no way to see if they are online or not. Another tip that I have is to fix when the game randomly kicks you out. I find that sometimes when I get imposter, I just get kicked out of the game and it is so frustrating and I‚Äôm sure a lot of people can agree with that. Also, maybe add some game modes. A few idea are hide-and-seek, a detective mode, and a mode where the ship is going to crash back to Earth and you have to try to save it. For hide and seek you can be either hider or seeker, the hiders can duck under boxes and hide in vents. But to keep the game interesting, every two minutes, all hiders must move spots and they have ten seconds before the seeker comes to get them. When a hider is tagged, they become a seeker. For detective mode, someone is is the detective, and the other crew mates have to try to get them out. This is a great game, and these are a few tips to make it better!

title: Among us is great but it isn‚Äôt the same anymore
text:
This game is amazing and a lot of fun, especially when playing with friends and family, but with the new update it has been hard to communicate in the game because of no one being able to type. I noticed that when I go to games, people don‚Äôt, and maybe aren‚Äôt able to type in the chat anymore, there is no more conversation. 

Also with the new update it makes it hard to type what you really mean, there aren‚Äôt a lot of options of words for us to choose, to say what we are trying to suggest. I think that we should take the update down, and that we should be able to at least have messages edited, like if there is a bad word it is blurred out, the change of the chat is probably why this update occurred in the first place, and I completely understand the concern. 

Due to not being able to type in the chat, the only way that I can communicate to play the game is by talking, and on the game you can‚Äôt hear everyone‚Äôs voices, so I am only able to play with my friends if I call them or text. I think that many people that play the game wants the original version back, it was just easier, and a little more fun that way .

title: Good but the update.....
text:
I LOVE Among Us. I draw among us, play it, and even write little stories about it! I don‚Äôt know why I‚Äôm so obsessed with these little bean astronauts. But I just recently (only 5 minutes ago) looked at the new update. It‚Äôs called Quick Chat. I qualified for the quick chat and I thought it would just give me options to say so I don‚Äôt waste time. It was what I thought it was like...until I realized I couldn‚Äôt even type in the chat. I couldn‚Äôt say anything I wanted to. I can‚Äôt even say hi to people! Innersloth states that it‚Äôs easier, faster, and safer. But it‚Äôs not easy. You have to search through all the little quotes just to find the one you‚Äôre looking for, which is also why it‚Äôs not faster. And, I guess you could say it‚Äôs safe. I‚Äôm not sure I like this update, out of ALL the among us updates. Please fix it so us players can at least type things other than the ones we are supposed to. I would like to say hi to other players! Also, fix all the bugs, try to get hackers OUT, and no more bad names. For example, Ineedagf. Have a great day!
                          Sincerely, A fellow player

title: Game is pretty fun but there is a few complaints
text: Alright so to start off this game is lots of fun, during the pandemic me and my friends have gotten on zoom and shared codes in the chat and played together. The game is nice because all you have to do is just share codes with each other and then you are in the same game as your friends! My first complaint is that one of my friends lately has not been able to get in without having to wait over 15 minutes at one time, so if you are a game creator of Among Us and you see this please tell how I can possibly fix that. One other thing that happens in Among Us every once in a while is that the game completely glitches, sometimes your screen goes black, sometimes something gets stuck are your such as the voting page and then you are not able to play or sometimes it gets stuck on the playing page and then you can not vote. But I will add that it is not very often that this happens but if you play everyday it would start to get annoying. You see Among Us is a good quality game but there are a couple of things that can changed to make it an even better game than it is now.

title: Because
text:
I rate this app a 2 star because
1) you have to use a Apple ID. When I first joined I put I was like 4 and it made me type In my Apple ID.  When I did it said it was wrong and I try deleting it but it said account deletion pending. I had been saying it for over a month and I can‚Äôt do anything about it. 
2) PING. I have no clue what ping is but it‚Äôs Annoying. If it gets higher then 6000 it kicks the whole server. If there are 15/15 people in a server and it‚Äôs about to start but ping is at let‚Äôs say 5000 then everyone gets kicked. Once it happened to me 4 times in a row! And then I got banned for playing for 3 minutes.
3) FREE CHATüò°üò°. I love free chat but people that can‚Äôt have their Apple ID into their AC (like me) can‚Äôt play with free chat. I think everyone should be allowed to play free chat. This is called being rude because everyone hates how you have it so people who haven‚Äôt signed into their Apple ID don‚Äôt get the play. 
I also hate when there are multiple people being picked and then the next round the same person being picked. I mean. If it happens to me I feel bad for others because others might want to be the imposter or the Seeker. Also‚Ä¶ I love the new mod where there is a seeker. I just think there should be 2 seekers.

title: Updates
text: I used to absolutely love this game. I could never put my phone down once I started. The thrill and graphics were amazing and the gameplay was super fun. I eventually deleted the game and didn‚Äôt come back to it for another year or so. I was excited to play again but once I began playing, I was not as thrilled as I thought I would be. The first thing I noticed was that I couldn‚Äôt type what I wanted in the chat, which I think takes away from the purpose of the game because with Quick Chat, you are restricted from a lot of things, which means it is harder to explain to other crewmates why you are trustworthy. I understand that people can say really mean things in the chat, but don‚Äôt take it away completely, maybe just censor certain words. I was also mad about the display names and the fact that you have to stick with a default one. Okay, I know people were abusing that power and making their names ‚ÄúBaddieTrumpyUwU‚Äù and all that crap, but again, bust censor certain words and phrases so that we can have our freedom back. I would play this game so much more if these updates were fixed, but in the meantime, I‚Äôll just stick to Sudoku.

title: Great game with huge bugs.
text: So, the brand new update that came out recently had resurged my love of this game. Between roles, unlockables, HUD updates, and achievements, it‚Äôs went from a 2/5 to a 5/5. However, there is one thing that is awful: the bugs. One minor one that gives crewmates an auto loss, where it overlays the hub over the starting area. Then an imposter can use a sabotage to kill everyone, and they win. However, this one next one is huge and makes the game literally unplayable. If you join a lobby, play a full game, leave, join a different one, and wait for the round to start, the game closes. This wouldn‚Äôt be so bad if not for a different new feature: temporarily banning. I like the concept. If a person intentionally leaves a game, they will get banned for 30 minutes, then an hour. How do I know this, you may ask? Well, when the game crashes like said previously, it triggers the ban feature! So, because the game has a bug, I get blocked from playing for a full hour! Please fix said bugs, as that alone will make the game much more fun.

title: Good app but here is some suggestions
text: I really like this app and I will continue to use it just it needs some more... extra. Again these are just suggestions to make the game better but it‚Äôs good without these suggestions. Please take these into consideration.

title: Great game but small problems
text: Among us is a great game and its so much fun to play with friends and figure out who the impostor is. It's an amazing murder mystery game where the crew mates try to figure out who the impostor killing the crew is. The crew must find out who it (or they) is/are. Just a some small problems, there are a lot of innapropriate names and stuff in the chat. I know there is restrictions on what you can name yourself but people have found ways to work past them and use symbols or spell it differently. This game make the game innapropriate for young children. Also, when you leave the game before it starts, because you HAVE to get off it stops you from joining another game for "intentionally disconnecting" even if your parents called you for something or told you to get off, or if you have to leave because they are starting it before your friends can join. Although I know they are doing this because some people leave if they don't get the role they want or just to be annoying but this feature can be really annoying and aggravating. Thanks for reading my review and have a nice day.ü•∞

title: I love this game just wish a few things were added!
text: I absolutely love this game and play it constantly with my friends! I just wish a few things were added to the game. I feel like impostors should be able to read and reply to ghost chat, like maybe have two chats on the impostors screen one only ghosts can see and the other everyone sees, a lot of my friends also agree that the game would be much more fun if the impostors could talk to the ghosts. I also would love to see more colors be added to the game, like maybe some pastels or an option that you can make your own color.  Another addition I would love to see is girl clothing options, right now all the outfits are really geared towards males and I can never find an outfit I would actually wear, I would definitely spend more money that way!üòÇ Also I do get kicked out of games a lot when I shouldn‚Äôt, it would be in the middle of a round and the game will glitch and say I don‚Äôt have internet even though my phone still has full bars. Anyways I really LOVE this game and so do all of my friends thank you so much for reading!

title: Great but‚Ä¶
text: I‚Äôve played Among Us for about 2 years I think. In 2020 when it became such a great hit, and I loved the game. I played it almost everyday! I unfortunately stopped and never got to play the old version of the game and when I came back, almost EVERYTHING looked different! I was so confused. So I decided to play a round and when I finally got in to change my avatar, so many beautiful colors! I was completely amazed on how much they updated, but then I went to go see if I could put my ‚Äòlil among us tiny boi‚Äô on, but I couldn‚Äôt cuz he was gone. And I‚Äôd bought a lot of those with MY money, and now their gone. But that wasn‚Äôt the only thing, when I discovered a dead body, I mean everything looked normal, the map, the characters, but after reporting that body, the whole discussion chat looked weird. When I tried typing in chat, it didn‚Äôt work. So I was confused. So I never got to explain myself. So my two complaints of the new update: my little pet accessories were gone and, you can‚Äôt type in chat. I later came to realize that you couldn‚Äôt change your name, and you had to sign in to have free chat. But overall I love Among Us! Thank you for your time.

title: Great, but has some major issues
text: First of all, I would like to say that this is a very fun game and I love it, however there are a few major concerns that I have about this game. For a game that is supposedly for people 9 and up, (and let‚Äôs face it, nobody follows those guidelines) this game can be very unsafe and inappropriate for minors. The minuscule censorship on the chat (that can easily be turned off) provides for a very inappropriate and toxic environment in almost every server I have ever joined. There are people swearing, talking about lewd topics, profanities, and on many occasions, people asking others for ages, phone numbers, and more private information. This is a very unsafe environment for children. I have had many encounters with creeps on this ‚Äúchildren‚Äôs‚Äù game. It is very sad when people are trying to play a normal game and somebody asks about adult websites and other sexual topics. This game is a great game, but please, impose some sort of safety and censorship on the chat, like Roblox. You probably won‚Äôt see this, and it might make people mad, but I am not asking you to make it impossible to say anything in the chat, just inappropriate terms and profanities that ruin the fun of the game.

title: I love it but...

There are a lot of hats that you can put on your character for free but you can‚Äôt put on any outfits or pets without paying for them some people are allowed to pay for those items but really want those items.I think if you those outfits and pets should be put on for free so other peopleThey aren‚Äôt allowed to buy that kind of stuff can use some of those things. No these disadvantages can I change my opinion about among us being a great game. I love among us and it is a really fun game that you can play in your free time. I do think these disadvantages should be thought about, but that‚Äôs really it.

title: SUPER FUN! Just a few things.
text:
Wow! This game is outstanding, so fun, so addicting, so fun to play with friends! This game is an amazing version of a murder mystery. Its perfect for many ages, it not too intense for younger players and its fun for families! This game is amazing and I love it.
But I few things are bothering me. One, it the pets. I know you have to buy the pets, but you have to buy all of them individually ($3 each) along with the outfits and stuff. I would ask maybe if there be like three default pets for people to use since there are many younger players who cant get any of those. So maybe just three default pets for people to use would be great. Also, many older players turn this cute fun game into some sort of toxic dating app. It would be cool if when people first get the game that it asks the age and then will sort them into groups around their age, just so little kids don‚Äôt get traumatized or tricked. And yes, some people will lie about their ages, but I‚Äôm sure most people don‚Äôt. So, at least it will be 
safer for more people.
Other than those things, the game is so fun, and just perfect for family and friends to play! I love this game and I‚Äôm sure everyone else will!

title: ‚ÄúDisconnected‚Äù Bugs are TERRIBLE
text: The game is great, really. I got it because it‚Äôs what all the clubs at my high school are playing, and it‚Äôs a good way to connect in shelter-in-place. However, I have never been so frustrated with a game. It seems like all my friends can play, but it always disconnects me because the ‚Äúpackets‚Äù don‚Äôt come back. I know what pinging is and what packets are in computer lingo, but I get this disconnected notice every time I try to join a game, start a new round, or navigate to other apps while attempting to play private mode. Really, a game this popular should have bugs worked out. Since you are at the top of the charts and the focus of a billion memes, you should have the budget to get someone to fix these bugs. It‚Äôs ridiculous and annoying that I can‚Äôt play with my friends but I can play with total strangers. Fix these bugs and you‚Äôll have a timeless game. I tried to play on both IPad Pro 2017 and IPhone 5s, and even a different network and neither worked. If you are playing just for short, fun and entertainment with strangers, this is a great game. This is not a good game if you like long-term games, and not a good game if you want to play with friends. The bugs make it almost impossible.

title: Seriously fun...with friends
text: This game is great. It really is a blast if you have a good group to play with and I love that you can customize the game to fit your play style. I do see a lot of complaints that could be solved by lobby hosts simply balancing those options to fit your group‚Äôs play style. There are a lot of good suggestions for optimizing play out there. I also see complaints about how others play, the tactics and language they use, etc. Seems like kicking them or voting them off is a good solution to that particular problem. One thing I‚Äôm starting to get very frustrated about tho (and I know I‚Äôm not the only one) in public lobbies is when 3-5 people instantly quit within the first few seconds of the game because they don‚Äôt get impostor. I think a simple solution would be that anyone who quits in the middle of the game can‚Äôt join another lobby until that current game is over. Or maybe a 5 minute timeout or even being unable to quit until you have died, something like that. Other than that, this is great fun (typical online jerk behavior from other players notwithstanding)

title: Good but....

title: Crashes, and adding a ‚Äúreport‚Äù button
text:
This game is great, i have a lot of fun... except for the toxic, insulting players. I had an experience with a user that kept on calling me Mexican, even though im not, i just know how to speak Spanish. He ended being banned by me for being extremely racist and disturbingly disrespectful. I would have loved for a ‚Äúreport button‚Äù feature to be available. But I also understand why one doesn‚Äôt exist, there is no registration sequence to play the game... but isn‚Äôt there a player id? Why not permanently ban an id from joining another id in the same server, hence a ‚Äúreport‚Äù feature. My other argument is the constant crashes in game, it gets pretty annoying. I play the game on in ‚Äòipad 6th gen‚Äô and since the new ‚Äúregional‚Äù update, crashes have been pretty constant. Please look into these, especially the crashes. I hope feedback like these make the game even better! :)
Update: It crashes more and more every day, as in it gets worse. Please, fix this, i am not having fun anymore. The game takes me out after every game or even in a game, and it‚Äôs annoying.

title: Fun game, if it weren't for all of the technichal issues and lack of "tech support".
text: I loved this game so much, it's kind of like werewolf or mafia for those who haved played. I even enjoyed playing it on my phone so much that I decided I wanted to try it out on my mac but when I went to change my birth year on my mac, it reset back to 2021 and then confirmed it as my birth year before I could do anything about it. Now it won't let me log into my old account without parental consent which involves sending in data that I personally, am not comfortable sending to a random company on the internet. (One of the confirmation methods involves sending in money?) My account used to say I was 21  but now says that I am 0 which would be nearly impossible for a infant to set up an among us account. This account also has my data and purchases held on it and I do not want to lose that content. Along with this I have searched the app for any type of "help center" and there's no tech support. At this point if I want to continue playing I will have to just drop the old account completely. And if I do end up redownloading, I for sure will not be playing the mac version as I don't want to come accross this issue again.

Over all I love it

title: Love this game, but:
text:
I absolutely love this game, and the new map and colors are amazing. As someone who is a ‚Äúbit old‚Äù(apparently) to be playing this game, I still find it very much enjoyable.
My only issue so far? Is that there are only three servers worldwide and when one goes down you practically can‚Äôt play the game at all anymore, even if you switch to a different server. This was the reason I deleted this app for the first time; bc the servers were always down. I re-downloaded the app after a few months when they had released the new colors and the new Airship map. I haven‚Äôt had issues for two weeks since downloading it again. But after two weeks of no problems it seems like the both the North America and Europe servers are down and there are never any local servers, at least that are available to me.
It would be really nice if there were more servers worldwide so that maybe the three servers that are available at the moment wouldn‚Äôt have so much riding on them anymore and would allow them, and the new worldwide servers, to function properly and not experience as many problems causing people to be unable to enjoy the app.

title: Quick Chat
text: Okay... uhh.. a lot of my friends and people I know, have quitted among us because of your ‚Äúgood‚Äù idea of ‚Äúquick chat‚Äù Okay, sorry, not trying to be mean. But I don‚Äôt get it. I mean, when I report a body, or someone vented on cams, I have to literally find out what to press, it‚Äôs confusing. I get why you did quick chat, because a lot of people sometimes do inappropriate stuff. But you didn‚Äôt have to change it to this. Can you please fix the quick chat please. Or lots of other people are going to quit. Among us is boring now! You can‚Äôt have fun, like with new friends you make. All you can really say, is ‚ÄúHi‚Äù Or ‚ÄúYeet‚Äù like really- yeet? And hi? So.. Among us, please fix your quick chat update.. please, and thank you.

title: Among us is among my favs!
text: Okay so I love among us, hence the five star rating. Out of the all the mobile games it is easily the best, so of course I only have one critique. Because of how personal this is, it didn‚Äôt affect the overall rating I gave it, it‚Äôs just kind of something that has been eating at me ever since I downloaded the app. Throughout my time playing this cool game, I have made genuine friends in all corners of the three maps. But there is no add friend functionality, so after we connect we can never see each other again. I wouldn‚Äôt have included this at all if it weren‚Äôt for the incident that occurred earlier today. The name I gave myself in this game is,‚ÄùJohnnycake‚Äù and all I was doing was trying to search for other characters( no I was not trying to role play) because I thought it would be such a funny coincidence. So I was looking for a game and before I could tap on the lobby entitled,‚ÄùSodapop‚Äù my finger had clicked back to the menu. And then he was gone. Along with my dreams of befriending the many diverse people of Among Us. Please get back to me at your earliest convenience. Thank you!
